sentences.sentence: These figures appertain to last year's sales.
sentences.translation: 这些数字指的是去年的销售额。

sentences.sentence: Of all the great interest appertain to our country, that of union _ cordial.
sentences.translation: 在我们国家的重大利益之中最为重要的是我们热情、 可信。

sentences.sentence: Of all the great interest which appertain to our country, that of union_cordial.
